class ConfigWidget(exptConfigUi, fieldtype, objName, name, oldvalue, widgetDict, parent=None)[source]¶

Class for arbitrary config widget

content¶
class ExptConfigUi(project, scriptname)[source]¶

Class for configuring an experiment

accept()[source]¶

Ok button is clicked. Checks database settings before proceeding.

addObj(guiName, objName, name)[source]¶

Add (objName, name) to the table widget, and add the appropriate tab to the tab widget. :param guiName: ‘hardware’ or ‘software’ :type guiName: str :param objName: The type of hardware or software :type objName: str :param name: The name of the specific piece of hardware or software :type name: str

getWidget(guiName, objName, name)[source]¶

Get the config widget associated with the given objName. :param guiName: ‘hardware’ or ‘software’ :type guiName: str :param objName: The type of hardware or software :type objName: str :param name: The name of the specific piece of hardware or software :type name: str

hardware¶

A list of hardware tuples of the form (objName, name)

Add is clicked.

onCustomDatabaseNameChanged(state)[source]¶
onItemChanged(guiName, item)[source]¶

A new name is typed in for a table entry

onRemove(guiName)[source]¶

Remove is clicked. Remove selection from the table widget and remove from the tab widget. :param guiName: ‘hardware’ or ‘software’

onSelect(guiName, currentRow, currentColumn, previousRow, previousColumn)[source]¶

Table widget is clicked. Change the current tab on the tab widget.

onTabWidgetChanged(guiName, index)[source]¶

Tab widget is clicked. Change the selection in the table widget. :param guiName: ‘hardware’ or ‘software’ :type guiName: str :param index: new selected index in tab widget :type index: int

reject()[source]¶

Cancel or close is clicked. Shut down the program.

setup the dialog box ui
